channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Fetterman slams Democrats for shutting down government
item.description: Sen. John Fetterman (D-Pa.) has a reputation for going against his party and he's been doing so by voting to reopen the government. He spoke to NPR Mo...

item.title: Trump floats tariff 'dividends' even while plan shows major flaws
item.description: President Trump says the government will distribute checks to Americans from tariff revenue. Here's what that could mean.

item.title: Police Investigate Deadly New Delhi Blast as Possible Terrorist Attack
item.description: India’s prime minister, Narendra Modi, said the “conspirators” behind an explosion that killed at least eight people would be brought to justice.

item.title: Is hormone therapy for menopause right for you? 6 things to know

item.title: 'No turning back': More and more Ukrainian women join the army to fight Russia

item.title: Tatsuya Nakadai, Japanese Star Known for ‘Ran’ and Other Classics, Dies at 92
item.description: He was a fixture of postwar Japanese cinema and starred in films by Akira Kurosawa and other directors of that era.

item.title: When the dust settles on the shutdown deal, Democrats will likely still have the edge

item.title: Use A.I. to Reinvigorate Democracy — Not Replace It
item.description: Governments shouldn’t hand over decision-making to A.I.

item.title: Late Night Is Disappointed in Democrats Over Shutdown Deal
item.description: “Our long national nightmare is different,” Stephen Colbert said after some Democratic senators voted with Republicans to end the government shutdown.

item.title: These Sheep Have a Statement to Make
item.description: How fashion connected a designer, a farmer, Grindr and a herd of male-oriented rams.
